      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Object[] checkConstant(double[] sequence)
      Checks if the sequence represents approximately a fixed sequence (c,c,c,c,..) ret[0] is true if the sequence is linear ret[1] is the constant of the sequence if ret[0] is true.
      static java.lang.Object[] checkLinear(double[] sequence)
      Checks if the sequence represents an arithmetic sequence (approximately) ret[0] is true if the sequence is linear ret[1] is the common difference of the sequence if ret[0] is true.
      static java.lang.Object[] checkQuadratic(double[] sequence)
      Checks if the sequence represents a quadratic sequence (approximately) ret[0] is true if the sequence is quadratic ret[1] is the common difference of the sequence if ret[0] is true.

      • checkQuadratic

        public static java.lang.Object[] checkQuadratic(double[] sequence)
        Checks if the sequence represents a quadratic sequence (approximately) ret[0] is true if the sequence is quadratic ret[1] is the common difference of the sequence if ret[0] is true.
        Parameters:
        sequence -
        Returns:
        ret[0] = true if sequence is qudratic(or sub-quadratic or linear), ret[1] = the coefficient of n^2

      • checkLinear

        public static java.lang.Object[] checkLinear(double[] sequence)
        Checks if the sequence represents an arithmetic sequence (approximately) ret[0] is true if the sequence is linear ret[1] is the common difference of the sequence if ret[0] is true.
        Parameters:
        sequence -
        Returns:
        ret[0] = true if sequence is linear, ret[1] = the common difference

      • checkConstant

        public static java.lang.Object[] checkConstant(double[] sequence)
        Checks if the sequence represents approximately a fixed sequence (c,c,c,c,..) ret[0] is true if the sequence is linear ret[1] is the constant of the sequence if ret[0] is true.
        Parameters:
        sequence -
        Returns:
        ret[0] = true if sequence is constant, ret[1] = the constant
